shortdesc.ph: callback. Triggered when the local user registers a User Account.
Callback triggered when the local user registers a User Account.

p.codeblock: virtual void onLocalUserRegistered(uid_t uid, const char* userAccount)
public void onLocalUserRegistered(int uid, String userAccount)

section.p: After the local user successfully calls to register a User Account, or calls joinChannelWithUserAccount to join a channel, the SDK triggers this callback and returns the local user's user ID and User Account.

When the local user successfully calls to register a User Account or calls joinChannelWithUserAccount to join a channel, the SDK triggers this callback and returns the local user's user ID and User Account.

section.title: Trigger Timing
section.p: This callback is triggered when the local user successfully registers a User Account or joins a channel.

plentry.pd: The user ID of the local user.
The User Account of the local user.
User ID of the local user.
User Account of the local user.
